forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few showers early becoming a steady rain for the afternoon. High 13C. Winds SW at 25 to 40 km/h. Chance of rain 90%.

forecastday.fcttext: Showers this evening becoming a steady light rain overnight. Low 46F. Winds W at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 80%.
